comment: She does not care for her students and will yell at you without hesitation. She is demanding and almost made me fail. Avoid her at all costs
Terrible professor. Should be fired immediately. Dropped within two weeks after she kept yelling at me for being confused after being given no instructions at all. DROP, RUN, AND NEVER LOOK BACK,
Dude don't suffer, if you see this class in your schedule, run.
She's easier than you think. Ready to leave class more than you. Easy just do your notebook beforehand.
rating_tags: Tough grader--So many papers--Graded by few things

comment:
hear me when I say IF YOU NEED CHEM AT ALL for your career or grad school or anything avoid her at all costs. impossible to pin down for office hours, randomly shouts for students making human mistakes. Never tells you why she marks stuff down, just takes point off with no explanation. 
taking her has been my biggest regret in college so far.

Probably the worst professor l've ever had.
There wasn't a single lab where she didn't accuse everyone of googling answers. She assumes she knows what everyone's intentions are and thinks people mess up on purpose. Take too long at a lab station? You'll get ridiculed in front of everyone. Very tough grader and constantly rude to students.
DONT TAKE

very tough grader. we buy a booklet to never use the booklet, makes us create a whole notebook where we rewrite the introduction, procedure and data tables for each lab in our notebook instead of just using the booklet then you rewrite the lab report in the booklet turn that in AND THE NOTEBOOK. Rude, insulted me through sarcasm multiple times.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Withdraw from the course. Very tough grader and almost seemed like she did not care for students. Often mentioned how this was her second job and that she primarily worked in a high-school nearby.
She like to yell at you for no reason like getting up to get a pencil and she always yelling and she is really rude and A VERY TOUGH GRADER
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Shes an pretty tough grader who knows a lot about what shes teaching, but will scold you if you dont know the answer to every question and will pretty much roast you if you get something wrong. Shes a really tough grader and if you don't copy down what you need to you WILL be kicked out of the class and not be allowed to return.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: She is a pretty rude professor and also grades the labs harshly as if it were some doctorate research (it's only a general intro science lab course). I was a transient student at KSU for the summer but I go to Georgia Tech, and even the lab section courses I took at Tech went way more smoothly than here. This was an unnecessarily difficult course.

The worst professor I have ever had. If you don't understand something she will make you feel like an idiot, I felt like I couldn't ask questions in class. She is a high school teacher and you can tell she treats all the students as if we are in high school or worse. If you just walk out to use the bathroom she will yell at you. PLEASE DO NOT TAKE
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Work is extremely hard however she actually cares about the students and definitely the work. Pushed me to become better than i thought i could

Prof Kailasa cares about you and is strict. Chem labs are rigorous and you will have a fair bit of homework each week. Her grading was very fair, she never expected something from us that hadn't been clearly explained.

First session was after the drop deadline. Vague syllabus tripped up multiple students. Teacher bars you from class if you don't have the previous lab's work and a significant amount of pre-lab work done.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS
